faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.intro: Need clarity on how Decisia works? Here you‚Äôll find answers to the most common questions about our app, features, and decision-making process.

q1.question: What is Decisia?
q1.answer: Decisia is a decision-making app that helps you structure complex choices by defining your own options and criteria. You can score manually or use AI assistance (GPT) for automatic, transparent evaluation.

q2.question: How does the AI scoring work?
q2.answer: In AI mode, GPT analyzes your decision context and criteria, then assigns scores and provides explanations for each option. This gives you an objective and structured overview.

q3.question: Do I need an account to use Decisia?
q3.answer: Yes. You need a free account to create, save, and access your decisions.

q4.question: Can I use Decisia for private and business decisions?
q4.answer: Absolutely. Decisia is flexible for both personal choices (e.g., job offers, purchases) and business decisions (e.g., vendor selection, hiring).

q5.question: Is my data safe?
q5.answer: Your decisions are stored securely. We use modern authentication and do not share your data with third parties. You can delete your data at any time.

useCases.title: Use Cases & How Decisia Scores
useCases.intro: Decisia structures decisions ‚Äî solo or as a team. Define options, criteria, and weights, score each option per criterion, and get a transparent ranking. If you like, AI can pre-score for you.

how.title: How the scoring works
how.l1: Set weights: Decide how important each criterion is. We automatically scale them to 100% (sum = 1).
how.l3: Result (Private): For each option, multiply weight √ó rating per criterion and add it up. Higher = better.
how.l4: Result (Team): Each person has their own weights & ratings. First compute a personal score, then take the team average.
how.l5: AI mode: In private decisions, AI can fill the 1‚Äì10 matrix with explanations (you can edit). In teams, owner/admin can run AI; afterwards the decision is locked (AI-lock).
how.l6: Deadline (Team): After the deadline, inputs are locked.
